--- title: SolarDatasetQuery keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Get information on the closest climate data for a given location" description: "Get information on the closest climate data for a given location" nb_path: "02_solar.dataset_query.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class SolarDatasetQuery[source]

SolarDatasetQuery(api_key, lat=None, lon=None, address=None, radius=100, return_all_stations=False) :: _GetPostRequest

Returns information on the closest climate data for a location.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Information on climate data for the location closest to the specified one.

{% raw %} 
solar_dataset_query = SolarDatasetQuery(api_key=NREL_API_KEY,
                                        lat=40,
                                        lon=-105,
                                       )

/Users/stlp/Documents/Github/nrel_dev_api/nrel_dev_api/core.py:30: UserWarning: ['No intl data found for lat=40.0 lon=-105.0']
  warnings.warn(message=str(content["warnings"]), category=UserWarning)
{% endraw %}

{% endraw %}

Get information about all the stations within a specified radius

{% raw %} 
solar_dataset_query = SolarDatasetQuery(api_key=NREL_API_KEY,
                                        lat=40,
                                        lon=-105,
                                        radius=100,
                                        return_all_stations=True
                                       )
